page.title: 03Religion Methodist Church.
page.content: This is what we found out. The church is fifty years old and the present minister has been here for five years. He takes three services a week. Before the church was built the Methodists met in a small building near Pickmoss Lane. The Minister is retiring shortly to live in Hindhead, Surrey. Priests wear white collars as a kind of uniform. In the church they have used two different types of hymn books since 1932. On average sixty people come to each of his services. They have thirty-seven bibles in the church and sixteen people sing in the choir. While he has been here he has baptised sixteen children and married fourteen couples. The land owned by the church used to be farmland.
